objects.text:
• Premium Sterling Silver
• Elegant Wreath Design
• Beautiful Pink Drops
• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional design for a premium jewelry item, divided into four equal quadrants with a soft, elegant theme. In the top-left quadrant, the brand name is prominently displayed using the `heading` text layer, followed by the product name and category via `subheading` and `product_category`, with a tagline below using the `tagline` layer. The top-right quadrant features the product image (`product_image`) — a pair of detailed rose-gold earrings. The bottom-left quadrant includes a bulleted list (`description`) highlighting key features, the product price via `price`, and a rounded rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the text "SHOP NOW" (`cta`). Subtle circular highlights and wavy stroke patterns add a decorative flair around the quadrants.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFF5F5)
- Rose Pink (#C95D67)
- Pale Rose (#FFEEF1)
- Blush (#FFD6DC)
- Soft Red (#F8A1AD)
- Warm White (#FFFFFF)
- Highlight Circles: #FFB6C1, #FFC0CB, #FFAAB5, #FFD1D9
- Accent Lines: #F47983, #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a delicate and luxurious color palette ideal for a feminine and elegant advertisement banner. The primary color is a soft **rose gold (#E6A4A4)** that frames the earrings and provides warmth and sophistication. This blush tone smoothly blends with **light pink (#FAD0D0)** in the petal accents, adding a soft, romantic touch. Bright, clear **diamond white (#FFFFFF)** stones create sparkling highlights, contrasting beautifully with the surrounding pink hues. Additionally, hints of **crystal silver (#C5C6C7)** from the marquise-shaped stones enhance the brilliance. This harmonious blend balances warmth and sparkle, making it perfect for showcasing elegance and refinement in promotional designs.
